mapper.insert: insert into sample_product_reviews (review_no, review_title, review_content, product_no, user_id) values (review_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{productNo}, #{userId})
mapper.select: select review_no as no, review_title as title, review_content as content, product_no as productNo, user_id as userId, review_created_date as createdDate from sample_product_reviews where product_no = #{value} order by review_no asc
